description:
Smart. Focused. Email.

Fast, cross-platform email designed to filter out the noise - so you can focus on what's important.
Hey everyone!
There’s more than meets the eye in today’s small, yet mighty update to Spark:

- Added a new option that allows users to view all ‘Priority’ emails for better email management.
- Adjusted the behavior of the composer when opened from the calendar, improving the user experience.
- Updated the content of the warning message shown when users edit calendar events, making it clearer and more informative.
- Fixed an issue where the calendar view would scroll to the center when opening event previews after midday.
- Resolved a problem where the ‘Back to Home Screen’ button on the sidebar was unresponsive when navigating from the calendar.
- Fixed the bug that prevented users from changing the custom recurrence options (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly) during event creation or editing.
- Spark now correctly handles backlinks when no authorization process is running, improving reliability.
- Corrected the display issue with shared calendar slots, ensuring they now appear accurately.
- Fixed the issue where links to calls created in Amie were not being displayed in Spark.

Thank you for choosing Spark! We value your feedback. Please contact us at support@sparkmailapp.com if you have any suggestions or issues.
